subject: Re: [R] How to hide axis interval values in a plot
body:
thanks. got my answer.



spime wrote:
> 
> 
> 
>>plot(cars)
> 
> this shows a plot having interval values of axes (x-axis:5-25;
> y-axis:0-120). I want to hide these values. is there any way?
> 

--
